review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

review:
Раньше я не мог понять почему эта игра получила "смешанные" отзывы . Когда я прошёл  Super trench attack (2014) я ещё больше недоумевал : как продолжение такой классной игры могло не понравится половине игроков ? А теперь (после прохождения обучения и первой миссии Super trench attack-2 (2015) всё стало чётко и ясно . Проблема в том что это не продолжение первой части , ни по сюжету , ни по жанру . Тут нет Вайли и Бадди , и эта игра не является клоном Diablo-2 (2000) как была первая . Это клон тактики Herores of might and magic  (серии которую я очень сильно не люблю) . Тут вы не сможете браво бегать туда-сюда , попутно стреляя немцев  , тут Ада (главная героиня) делает четыре-пять шагов по карте , потом ждёт 2 минуты пока её ходы перезарядятся. За эти две минуты любой враг может спокойно подойти на расстояние выстрела и выпустить в неё пару очередей . Игра очень нудная , затянутая и скучная . Рефанд всё же делать не буду (из уважения и благодарности к разработчику за первую часть . и оттого что эту купил за 16 гривен на распродаже) . 
  Игру могу рекомендовать лишь фанатам пошаговых тактик (правда они могут найти много чего покруче) , но никак не тем кому понравилась Super trench attack (2014) .
Мало того : каждый раз ты начинаешь на новой карте с новыми условиями (да здравствует процедурная генерация !)

review: Wer den ersten Teil von Trench Attack gespielt hat, sollte diesen Teil lieber liegen lassen, denn er hat nichts mehr mit dem ersten Teil gemeinsam. Hatte der erste Teil noch eine Story, fehlt diese bei hier gänzlich. Eigentlich ist man nur mit einem von vier Damen hinter feindlichen Linien unterwegs und versucht sich durch mehrere Areale in Richtung Heimat vorzukämpfen. Dabei kann man in "Shops" Kämpfer, Nahrung und Ausrüstung kaufen die einem das Leben auf dem Schlachtfeld erleichtern. Im Prinzip sind die runden basierten Kämpfe nicht schlecht, werden aber ebenso schnell auch monoton, da man immer wieder auf die gleichen Einheiten trifft, wenn man weiß wie man diese Einheiten am besten bekämpft, dann ist das auch nicht mehr aufregend. Für zwischendurch ganz nett,...mehr aber auch nicht.

review:
Игры Retro Army Limited обладают особым шармом. Они криво нарисованы и сделаны так словно это одна большая шутка, но игровой дизайн при это всегда на высоте.

Я прошёл STA2 полностью и именно с этой игры начал своё знакомство с другими проектами компании. STA2 это отличное тактическое приключение к элементами рогалика. Здесь вы будете распределять ресурсы и бороться за жизнь каждого солдата, жизнь которого может оборваться от одного лишь не верного тактического решения. Ко всему этому нужно добавить ворох отличных визуальных шуток и весёлых мини игр под хорошо дополняющую действия музыку.

review:
Эту игру купили многие любители первой части, коим был и я. Сейчас я в полной мере понимаю такие низкие рейтинги этой игры и озлобленность комьюнити.

Дать ей "S.T.A.2" в название было большой ошибкой, ведь в игре нет ничего общего, кроме стиля рисовки, с оригиналом. Top-down шутер с сюжетом и юмором превратился в чистейший бессюжетный рогалик, который стал ещё пошаговым (в доисторическом стиле через карту). Я даже затрудняюсь провести аналогию. 

В ней мало контента, в ней мало разнообразия, в ней плохой менеджмент, но в ней живёт нечто забавное, какая-то недосказанность делает её симпатичной.

3,5/10

review:
Плюсы игры:
1. Пошаговые бои, как в Х-КОМ
2. Текстовые квесты с юмором, как в Спейс Ренджерах
3. Можно пострелять по уточкам

Минусы игры:
1. Самый главный, это тот, что игра не сбалансирована по сложности. Разрабы, вы офигели такую сложную игру делать? Вы сами в свою игру играли? Почему я должен сливаться на первом секторе, только потому, что мои противники ВСЕГДА сильнее меня и в большем количестве? Где баланс? Э! Деньги, еда капает по чуть-чуть, а мой отряд требует гораздо больше вливаний, чтоб норм себя чувствовать в боях. Мои члены отряда постоянно мажут, чуть ли не в притык, тогда как враги часто ваншотят.
2. Графа слишком уж простая.
3. Звуки слишком примитивные.

В общем, мое мнение, игру надо удалить из магазина, так как она не сбалансирована по сложности и от нее у игроков будет гореть.
Играйте только те, кто любит сложные челенджи. Я же играю в игры, чтоб раслабиться, а не чтобы у меня горело.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028570547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2563, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1522879237}
review:
"Super Trench Attack 2" ist ein isometrischer Taktik-Shooter.

Der erste Teil war unterhaltsam, mit einfachem aber gutem Gameplay, stilsicherer Comicgrafik und einem satirischen Humor.

Der zweite Teil behält zwar mit seinem Comic-Retro-Look die grundlegende Stilrichtung bei, macht aber ansonsten so ziemlich alles anders und scheitert damit auf ganzer Linie.

Denn der Taktik-Einschlag bedeutet zunächst, daß man auf einer generisch generierten Karte von Punkt zu Punkt klicken darf, um an den Endpunkt zu gelangen. An den meisten Punkten passiert eh nichts oder nichts relevantes, an einigen warten Gegner auf einen. Und da beginnt das ganze Elend. Denn scheinbar befinden wir uns in einem richtigen Shooter, wir können unsere Spielfiguren (es sind mehrere, denn wir kommandieren gleich einen ganzen Trupp) zunächst wie in einem isometrischen Shooter bewegen. Zunächst. Bis uns auffällt, daß wir eine Art Aktionsleiste besitzen. Ist diese aufgebraucht können wir uns nicht mehr bewegen. Und sie ist schnell aufgebraucht.

Der Gedanke eines Taktikshooters ist an sich sicher nicht der schlechteste, aber dann sollte man doch entweder mit Feldern arbeiten oder eine Engine verwenden, bei der man nicht an jeder Ecke hängenbleibt oder bei der es unklar bleibt, wo Objekte in der Umgebung eigentlich ihre Hitboxen haben.

Völlig unverständlich, warum die Entwickler durch den prozeduralen Aufbau die größte Stärke des Vorgängers fast komplett über Bord werfen: den Humor. Was noch an Witz übrig bleibt, schafft es nicht die Monitorrampe zu überwinden.

Also bleibt das Gameplay, das auch völlig unbefriedigend, teils kryptisch und unnötig kompliziert ausfällt. Spaß macht das so ziemlich überhaupt keinen und zwar weder für Casual-Spieler, die den ersten Teil mochten noch für Taktikfüchse, die bei diesem wirren Game-Design viel zu viele Unwägbarkeiten vorgesetzt bekommen. 

Und so wurde leider schon mit dem zweiten Teil eine vielversprechende Serie direkt gegen die Wand gefahren.

[h1]Wertung:[/h1]
3/10 Atmosphäre
3/10 Story
5/10 Grafik
5/10 Sound
3/10 Spielmechanik
2/10 Balancing
2/10 Spielspass

[h1]Fazit:[/h1]
Warum nur? Warum?

[h1][b]3/10 Gesamtwertung

review:
[h1]스포일러 부분은 사소한 팁,공략입니다.
간단하게 게임부분만 보신다면 생략하셔도 좋습니다.[/h1]

[u]이 평가는 개인적인 생각이 포함되어있습니다.[/u]

전작을 계승했다긴 보다는 새로운 시리즈로 시작된 슈트어2입니다.

스토리 자체는 아직 깨지 않아서 확실히 모르겠지만
[b]거의 없는 것[/b]으로 예상됩니다.
그냥 게임 배경 설명해 주고는 끝부분 까지 버텨서 가면 끝인 걸로 봅니다.

[h1] 2.23 엔딩결과 글자만 나오고 끝났습니다.
그냥 전쟁이 끝났다는 수준의 글과 폭죽터지는 배경뿐입니다.

그리고 결정적으로 엔딩부분은 전작보다 더 후졌습니다.[/h1]

그러므로 확실한 스토리 라인을 파악하기가 어렵습니다.
그냥 블랙 아미한테 쫓기는 수준..?
그리고 그린 아미들은 어떡게 됐나 싶기도 하고..


게임 자체가 아예 턴 베이스로 바뀌어 버렸고,
매번 한 장소를 지나갈때마다, 조사, 교전으로 나누
어 집니다.

시작전에 ADA의 레이아웃이 몇개 있는데
게임을 많이 할 수록 해금이 되기도 합니다.

첫 난이도를 깨면 또 다른 캐릭터로 할 수 있습니다.
2번째거는 Marie라고 기관사수1명이 나올겁니다.

[spoiler]전 개인적으로 2,3번째거 추천합니다.
2번은 기관수 2명에 돈과 식량이 좀 적고
3번은 여자 1명밖에 없지만 돈이 좀 넉넉하기도 해서.[/spoiler]

난이도는 4종류로 나뉘어져 있는데, 그 난이도는 식량소비량과
얻는 돈만 바뀔분 적들의 난이도가 바뀌지 않습니다.

물론 시작전에 난이도도 있습니다.
트레이닝, 하드 등등...

시작 전 갈 수 있는 루트가 각각 랜덤으로 짜지어 지는데

먼저 상점에 들어가면 일단 자기 캐릭터 상태를 볼 수 없습니다.
자기 캐릭터에 맞는 무기팩을 살려면 확인을 해야 하는데, 자기 분대는 확인 할 수 없습니다.
다만, Medic라인에서 상처를 입을 시에는 확인이 가능합니다.

그리고 각 캐릭터마다 사용했던 렙 낮은 무기들은 팔지도 못하고 그대로 보존해야 합니다.
이게 좀 문제가 있다 싶은점이 있는데

예를 들어 렙 7짜리 아다(소위이자 주인공)한테 이미 5렙짜리 무기팩을 쥐어졌습니다.
그러던중에 상점에 들러 6랩짜리 무기팩을 쥐어 주고는, 교전 상태에서 바로 7랩이 되었습니다.
그러면 적들한테 뒤치지 않을려면 또 무기팩을 사야하는데, 이 얼마나 돈낭비인지...

더불어 분대원들을 사면, 쫓아내거나 없앨 수가 없는데
이 또 얼마나 식량낭비인지....

[spoiler]심지어 막판에 분대원 레벨 오르는거 대비할려고 1~2랩 높은거 사놨는데
다 죽어서 더이상 쓸모가 없어졌습니다.[/spoiler]

아마 제 생각에는 랩이 한 3렙쯤 되면, 미리 4렙 짜리나 2렙짜리 무기팩을 쥐어주시고,
상황에 따라서 사주는게 현명할 듯 합니다.

그리고 또 조사하는 라인과 교전라인이 대부분이라고 얘기 했는데,
가급적이면 조사는 많이 않하시는게 좋습니다.

대부분 분대나 아군에게 피해가 주는 이벤트가 대부분이고
[strike]뭐 이벤트 내용도 재미없지만.[/strike]
도박꾼과 폭탄꾼[1번째 스크린샷]이 대부분입니다.

이 문제가 처음에는 재밌게 당해서 그럴싸한데
나중에 후반부에 갈 수록 시속 100km/h짜리 샷건을 치게 되는 일이
발생하기도 합니다.

심하면 이벤트로 인해 게임오버가 되거나...

이벤트 내용을 조금 얘기해주면,

여자가 근처에서 씻고 있는데 아군을 보내면 데미지가 입고

염소있는데 아군을 보내면 염소한테 맞아 데미지가 입고

맛있어 보이는 버섯이 있는데 아군을 보내면 체력이 회복하고 등등.

[b]아, 적군한테 들키는 이유도 여러가지가 있는데[/b]

아군이 까먹고 포복을 안했다는지

아군이 방귀를 껴서 적군이 그냄새를 맞았다는지

휘바람을 너무 크게 불어서 적들이 파악했다는지

아무튼 여러 이유로 적군하고 반 강제교전을 해야하는 경우가 대부분입니다.


아 폭탄꾼은 15골드에 60식량을 사라 하는데, 꽤 이득입니다.
상점에서 보통 10골드에 30식량, 20골드에 60식량 정도 하는데
이 친구한테 사면 절약이 실천되니 명심하시기 바랍니다.

자주 "!"가 뜰 때가 있는데 이 "!"는 원래 순찰병들이나 밴딧들이 나오는게 대부분이지만 마법사가 나오기도 합니다.
이 마법사한테 돈을 주면(한 33골드정도?[strike]디럽게 X먹네[/strike])분대전체를 치료 할 수 있는데 문제는 이것도
확률이 있어서 그 마법사가 먹튀할 가능성이 있다는 것입니다.

[spoiler][strike]솔직히 도박꾼한테 다 털리는 것보단 낮죠 뭐.. [/strike][/spoiler]

자 이제 게임안을 보면, 사냥이벤트와 교전이 있습니다.
사냥이벤트는 조사 과정에서 해볼 수 있는데 [b]꼭 해주시는게[/b] 좋습니다.

덕분에 게임할때 즐거움 보다는 진지함, 답답,짜증남이 같이 뭍어나오기도 합니다.

[strike]저 Damn 오리랑 까마귀 녀석, 대체 왜 탄도차는 왜만든거야?[/strike]

[spoiler]맵마다 사냥이벤트가 다릅니다.
저는 개인적으로 스노우쪽에서 사냥하기 훨씬 쉽습니다[/spoiler]

특히 개가 자주 나오는데 개가 캐릭터 앞에 있을때는 이동하지 마시고, 방아쉬를 당겨주세요.[/spoiler]

초반에는 자주 만나서 첫 턴에 끝내버리세요![/spoiler]

아무튼

[h1]제대로 스토리를 알 기 힘들며

[u]캐릭터만 예뻐진 것 같고

[b]전작과는 다른 게임방식에[/b][/u][/h1]

등등 여러가지 복잡한 이유등으로 인해 결국 이게임은 복합적인 평가를 받게 되었습니다.

하지만 더 세련된 픽셀퀄리티에 이제는 투맨 아미보다는 4~5명의 분대(마지막 Exit라인에서는 5명가능)

review:
Pros- Cheap. Good for a laugh before the novelty wears off.

Cons - Everything once the novelty wears off in about 20 minutes.

Basic plot of the game, ripped directly from FTL. 
So, you have the "GET ITEM,  BASE ENTIRE GAME ON RUNNING FROM ENEMY, THEN FOR THE FINAL LEVEL, YOU TURN AROUND AND FIGHT AFTER GEARING UP FOR RUNNING THE ENTIRE GAME".

It was not fun then, it's not fun now. In fact, it's even more annoying. I did not like that part about FTL.  If you didn't read a guide or were playing blind, it's suddenly a massive fight at the end of the game. A game you spent the majority avoiding combat, building up your crew and not wasting time. Now you're up against THE STRONGEST ENEMY IN THE GAME because apparently , none of the other ships that are vastly superior to yours can do a damn thing about it.
But upon knowing this information, FTL's difficulty of getting through sectors in one piece suddenly vanishes when you know that all your speed is worthless and you need massive firepower for the final fight.

But this isn't about FTL, this is about STA2.

Excessive overabundance of Negative Events - Then the onslaught of negative events is impressive, even for this type of game.  Even FTL had sectors that were positive event locations. This? Using the Investigate Option most of the time leads you to take an unruly amount of damage. I could count in my previous games the amount of times I actually managed to "SNEAK PAST" but " x decided to , Fart, Whistle, Stepped on a Twig, Forget to Sneak" gets tired after a while.

Length - Did they really have to make it as long as an FTL run? 

Lack of actual control over the game - Lack of ability to actually deploy your units in your own formation, so every battle is a LOL SUPRISE!  - HAH HAH HAH HAHA. SO FUN AND CHALLENGING. MY WEAKEST UNIT SURROUNDED BY MACHINEGUNNERS AND DOGS ON A LEVEL WITH NO SHOP, GUESS HE GETS WOUNDED UNTIL THE NEXT AREA. 

What I don't understand is why is it random anyway? In the instances you actually do manage to ambush an enemy or choose to enter combat willings, which is rare enough ; Shouldn't you be able to choose where your people are positioned? Not go into battle and find your mortar unit surrounded by Scouts, halfway across the map where no help can each him in time.

Because any of the LOL RANDUM xD healing events either heal for the lowest amount possible or backfire in extreme ways.

Speaking of which.

Inability to heal properly - Wow. The game is designed to be as annoying as possible. Between Hunting Spots not spawning, the Useless Insane Magican never working and sectors without shops period, food being unable to heal the wounded severely cripples you if you say used investigate and lost massive amounts of health or got into a fight where all your useful units were on the wrong side of the map while your weaker ones were polishing enemy guns with their hair.

then there;'s combat in general.

The game loves to deploy either your best unit as far away as possible or your weakest unit either right next to a unit that will slaughter them if they attempt to move OR surrounded by dogs and or snipers and the rest of the units are just far enough that they won't make it in three actions.
 
Having this happen once or twice, sure but when it's 80% of the game. Not fun.

Another issue with combat is that some of the time, enemies not facing your character can fire an interception shot at them. Again, once or twice , it's a fluke, when it happens the majority of the game it's annoying to bring about a character who is totally blindsiding an target, only for that target to turn around and take a shot.  

What was the point of line of sight then?


I am also puzzled by the Advanced Wars CO powers. It would be nice to get an ingame guide or a little wording to tell you what it the powers do. Not just subject a person to the laughable scrolling character then the enemies taking damage.


Oh and Steam Cloud Sync only broke my game. Nearly completed a hard run as Marie on my Laptop. Synced it with my main computer. Beat the game, game crashes during credits, unlocked nothing. Not even Marie Stars.  So, 3 hours played while I was on vacation lost and they didn't even appear on my account. Oh well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053210555', 'num_games_owned': 497, 'num_reviews': 207, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1478590719}
review:
I want to say this is like a Super Gameboy version of FTL meets Valkyria Chronicles but the execution falls way short of that. The game has a map system with your squad contantly fleeing enemy pursuit, much like FTL, and it has a kind of combination real-time and turn-based combat , much like Valkyria Chronicles, but it's rather shallow and unrewarding. 

In FTL you want to hit many nodes because you never know what reward you might walk away with. Here, though, random "do the risky thing or leave" choices are never really worth the risk and combat only rewards you meger gold that you're going to need to patch yourself up after the fight so you basically just make a bee-line for the exit using the shortest route possible..

The combat is the most disappointing, though. Much like Valkyria Chronicles, if you get close to enemies they automatically fire at you on your turn but during enemy turns your units never fire back at the enemies and they HURT. When 1 shot can put your guy down, you basically can't let the enemy have a single turn or you get wiped. 

Overall, it's not a terrible game. It just falls way, way short of it's potential. I'd rate it neutral if I could but since there's nothing really stand-out about the gameplay and I have to go with "yes" or "no", I'm going to have to lean toward "no", sadly.

My initial reaction to the game was of utmost exasperation. I spent a couple of hours trying to get a grip on this sequel to what was an excellent game in my opinion. But my early hours not providing any dividends, I decided to call it quits. And so I let this game rest in my library for a very long while. But then I decided to give it another try because of the love I had for its prequel. 

I won't lie to you, this game is very different from Super Trench Attack, but once you spend some time playing it, you will realise that it is a fun game to play in its own respect. Sure this game needs some changes, but it wouldn't have been as fun had it been perfect. People can still expect the humour that was to be found in the first one. And for those who love the turn-based gameplay, this game can be an option.

Do I recommend it as much as I do the first one, probably not. But that doesn't mean people shouldn't get it. Wait for the sale and if you have a few pennies lying around, look this game up. 

I'd say a high 7 out of 10.

review:
我用英语写这篇测评是因为我看到开发者有在认真关注他们的测评，所以想友善的提醒一下。。

I would not recommand this game to my friends, especially comaring to STA1's massive success. I would like to spend 20 more hours for STA1 though it's not perfect. But for this one I would only play it for less than hour, then take the card and go away.  

It is a totally different game comparing with STA1. I can see many games in it, Oregon Trail, Valkyrie Chronicles, and Advanced War. But the problem is, it is NOT FUN anymore, and not free anymore. STA1 makes you feel like playing Skyrim WWI. You can go wherever you want, take down enemies to make some money and get lootings, complete missions, go find hidden places on the map, etc. But in STA2 you can only march in fixed routes which I dont even know what's the scenery is like, it's just lines, dots, lines, dots. NOT FUN. 

The character doesn't speak funny anymore. In STA1 the guy makes joke once he get an opportunity, some may stupid but basiclly it's really humorous. STA2 has cut a lot on this one. NOT FUN. 

I have no problem with turn based fight, Valkyrie Chronicles is a good game too, but the difficulty should be in a step shape. I play this game with characters in 60HP and 20 Atk, then I ran across enemies with 400HP and 50 Atk, then it's GAME OVER. I mean, what the H***? The set of the character is useless, if you cannot finish the fight in 1st round then the characters would be badly wounded, and it would take a century to recover. The travelling could help you heal---like you need to take a travel to China. This is unplayable. NOT FUN.

The game itself may not be that bad, I mean not "BAD" bad. I can give like 6/10, but I refuse to recommand it cuz STA1 is a really funny game, I love STA1 and I dont want it get ruined. It's just a kind reminder to developers, cuz I think they care. The developer should think about what cause over 90% support on 1st version. The game should make players relax and have fun, not to tortue them with simple, boring digital journey.

我不会向我的朋友推荐这款游戏，因为一代有趣得多。我想我应该会再在1代花上一些时间，但是2代对我来说基本上是挂卡游戏了。

比起1代来，2代的游戏完全转换了模式。可以看到开发者在试图创新，我看到了很多游戏的影子，比如俄勒冈旅程，战场女武神和GBA高级战争，但是游戏本身的趣味性被打了大折扣。1代的自由度很高，你可以去刷兵拿钱，可以清支线地堡，可以做主线任务，可以探究地图上的秘密地点，有那么一点一战天际省的感觉，二代的自由度完全丧失了，你只能沿着固定的路线行军，直接进入战斗场景。

1代很有趣的一点是主角讲话各种逗，虽然有的笑话蠢了点，但总体上营造了一种幽默的氛围。2代主角实在是缺乏幽默感，如果我要玩严肃的战争游戏我就去拉大栓了。

我对回合制战斗没啥偏见，毕竟当年也是在PSP上玩女武神玩的昏天黑地的小青年。但是游戏设定很渣。我带着一帮60血20攻的菜鸡兵在第五个点就遇上了一波400血50攻的精英敌军，立即Game Over，我去你怎么不再开台Sdkfz222来呢。人物的血量跟没有一样，战略设计就是渣渣，你要是不能在第一回合干翻所有人你就会被最垃圾的敌人打成重残，然后每旅行一次回五六点血。。。回满血我估计你得跑到莫斯科去。

游戏其实并没有那么渣，开发者是费了功夫用心在做的。我想我可以打6/10，但我依然不推荐这款游戏。游戏的本质目的是让玩家Have Fun，但这款游戏我认为没有做到这一点。

author: {'steamid': '76561197964377789', 'num_games_owned': 326, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 346, 'last_played': 1459161183}
review:
Alor, pourquoi je recommande ce jeux ? premierement il peut atteindre un prix tres faible en promotion, du coup on est difficilement deçu. L'humour du jeux ne vole pas haut mais arrive quand meme a m'arracher un sourire de temps en temps.

Le jeux semble etre un mix entre FTL et valkyria chronicle : vous ete sur une carte avec des "point d'interet", vous vous deplacer de point en point, parfois des bataille se lance, parfois un evenement au debouchée aleatoire et parfois rien ne se passe, certain point sont des magasin et finalement le point final qui sert a passer a une autre zone, un ecran de selection des zone apparait et nous permet de choisir notre itineraire pour atteindre notre but. Si vous avez jouer a FTL vous savez exactement quoi imaginer. Le carburant de FTL est ici remplacer par de la nourriture, consommée par chaque menbre de votre ascouade et a chaque mouvement, en fonction de la quantitée de rationnement la nourriture diminue + ou - vite et il en vas de meme pour la regeneration de vos soldat a chaque mouvement ( de base chaque soldat consomme 5 point de nourriture et regenere 5% de vie).

Les combat se deroule comme valkyrie chronicle : le combat commence sur la carte du champ de bataille, la vous selectionner un de vos soldat pour pouvoir le controler : le deplacement et tirer, vous avez une jauge de deplacement et vous pouvez vous deplacer apres avoir tirer. d'autre action peuvent se faire a la place de tirer comme le tres utile kit de soin qui peut etre utiliser une fois par bataille ( si vos soldat en sont equiper bien sur), les unitées que vous placer en defense pourront tirer sur les ennemis qui se deplace dans leur champ de tir. en tuant des ennemis vos soldat gagnent de l'xp et des niveau, en montant de niveaux ils peuvent utiliser des pack d'equipement de plus haut niveaux et donc devenir plus puissant et solide. Un scout ne peut equiper qu'un pack d'equipement de scout, les pack d'equipement peuvent egalement contenir un outil tels que les grenade ou un kit de soin et peuvent egalement avoir un buff qui a malheuresement une faible de rater quand on l'active (vampirisme, bonus de degat et malus a la defense, bonus a la precision, possibilitée de faire un point de degat ou 999,....). 
J'ai rencontrer 4 classes : les scout (representé par un galon) avec un tres bon deplacement, un fusil puissant et qui tire loin + un pistolet qui peut tirer 3 fois ( utile pour finir un ennemis blesser et tirer encore sur une autre cible, ou quand vous etes pret de votre cible pour essayer de faire 3 headshot).
 Le mitrailleur (representé par un double galon) utilise une puissante mitrailleuse qui peut facilement tuer un ennemis d'une action, voir 2 si ils sont l'un derriere l'autre, la shotgun qui peut tirer 2 fois est tres puissante et touche tout les ennemis a proximitée.
 Le sniper ( representé par un cercle barré) a un pistolet comme le scout et un fusil sniper, celui ci ma d'ailleur peu charmer, malgres les pourcentage de toucher elever il fallait vraiment que le l'aproche pret du combat pour qu'il touche, pas de chance j'imagine et en plus le sniper ne peut pas passer en defense.
 Le mortier ( representer par un obus) dispose d'une puissant mortier, tout simplement :)

Les packs d'equipement s'achete principalement au magasin tout comme la nourriture,des soldat suplementaire et des soin, les soldat "wounded" qui se sont fait abattre quoi, ne regenere plus de santé au fil des deplacement et doivent etre soigner via un magasin, l'or se gagne surtout en bataille, avec un bonus si vous tuer vos ennemis en 1 tour. On pourrait   penser que se jeux serait facile mais en fait pas du tout : les arme sont puissante et les soldat fragile, comme dans valkyria chronicle on dispose d'une quantitée de point d'action pour faire jouer ses soldat, du coup on peut tous les utiliser sur le meme et ravager la menace a portée de ce soldat, mais l'ennemis peut faire de meme et en generale ils ne se baladent pas sans objectif : ils veulent vous faire la peau.

On se retrouve finalement avec un jeux qui peut "vite se finir" (comme FTL quoi, si on a de la chance, qu'on joue bien et le tout avec une bonne connaissance du jeux) mais qui se trouve etre un jeux plutot interessant a jouer et qui une rejouabilitée sympathique (3 personnage principal a debloquer avec 5 composition de depart a debloquer) avec 3 niveau de difficultée bien doser : vous voulez en mode facile ? le jeux vous permet de finir la plupart des combat rapidement et facilement mais avec un minimum de tension dans les grosse mission, en mode normal les chose se corsent réellement ( puisque d'ailleur je ne l'ai pas encore fini en normal au moment ou j'ecrit ces lignes :D ). Si vous aimez valkyrie chronicle et/ou FTL , ce jeux pourrait vous plaire, essayez de passer outre les graphisme si ceux si ne sont pas dans vos gouts.

review:
Super Trench Attack 2 is a blast! I see a lot of people comparing it to FTL. I guess I can see why people would make that comparison. The map looks similar, you have crazy good/bad random events, and you can hire a squad as you progress. It is a rogue-lite, like FTL, so there is permadeath. Beyond these similarities the gameplay is much different.

As you move along the map screen you will encounter combat situations that will require you to put your squad to use. You will see representations of your squad members and enemies on a battlefield layout screen. From here you can strategize the best way to take out the enemy squad within your limited amount of turns. From the layout screen you can select one of your units and the game will switch into a top-down perspective of the battlefield. You are allowed to move and shoot a limited amount each turn (pistols=3 shots, shotguns=2 shots, rifles=1 shot, etc). This makes for some fun, strategic gameplay that I didn't grow tired of at all in my initial session.

The graphics are a throwback to late 80's/early 90's pc games- I can appreciate that. The Oregon Trail inspired hunting events are also a nice touch. Finally, the music is great. In particular, the music played during enemy turns. I can definitely recommend this game strongly to anyone who enjoys a good rogue-lite or even just an awesome nostaglia trip.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079789371', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 134, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1452987735}
review:
Hell, no! The first Super Trench Attack was an awesome not-to-be-taken-seriously shooter game with tons of bad guys, fun boss battles and something like a coherent story. This comes from the south end of a north-bound bull. 

We have a turn-based "strategy". You move the your squad between map points from West to East (spending your food), with each point marking a random event, a battle or a shop. A red area covers the map behind you, showing the progress of the enemy army. The reason this all happens is that you stole enemy invasion plans and need to get them home to avoid the impending war. 

If this doesn't scream FTL at you, go buy that game, it's orders of magnitude better than this shit. The main reason being that in FTL, the encounters get you better equipment, more crew and ship upgrades. Here, you get some cash, some food or some damage. Randomly. So, while in FTL you are motivated to visit as many places as you can, here your best option is to take the shortest route to the exit.

The battles themselves look like tiny X-com missions - your soldiers can move some distance per turn, shoot (1x rifle or 2x pistol) or do some other stuff. Two pistol headshot hits are not enough to kill an enemy. And I didn't fihure out how to use grenades. 

Plus, the ugly pixelated graphics. That was the only part I hated in the fist game - I know it's "retro", but it sucks. Why can't we get a simple game that looks like it's the 21st century? The hardware can handle it, the game runs at almost any resolution, so why do we keep pretending we're stuck in 1984?

review:
It's not a bad game really. The graphics are intentionally wacky and the settings are ridiculous. The system is good mix between FTL and Valkyria Chronicle, so if you are into turn base games and roguelike, chances are this game will entertain you for a while.

THAT BEING SAID, the game lacks depth. The battles, while interesting at first, becomes chore as soon as you get the hang of the game. The rogue-like depth is also pretty low as the game gets somewhat easy as soon as you figureout the effective combos. 

Balance is also terrible, as certain classes are absolutely useful while others are either somewhat limited to absolutely useless. The only classes that really shines in this game are scouts(initial class) and heavies. The other class has little justification for existence.

But at the price, is sitll enjoyable experience. I will recommend this game, but it's only a time killer at best.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067891330', 'num_games_owned': 8194, 'num_reviews': 202, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1451160484}
review:
[h1]Summary:[/h1]
While Super Trench Attack 1 was just a regular top-down shooter with crazy graphics style, the second game is absolutely different in terms of gameplay. It's obvious that the developer got inspired by two great games - FTL: Faster than Light and Valkyria Chronicles. 

Super Trench Attack 2 is a game where you proceed through randomly generated locations and battles, including special events like meeting mad men, bussinessmen, getting crew healed/damaged etc. The whole battle part is same like in mentioned Valkyria Chronicles - it's turn-based but all movement of specific characters are done directly by WASD controls.

As the previous game by this developer, graphic style is not serious but it's made in original silly way that you may like or hate. Check the screenshots and you'll see.

[h1]Positives:[/h1]
- [b]Unlockable content that motivates you to play again[/b]. More playable characters and upgrades.
- [b]RPG level and item set system for every character[/b].
- [b]Unique silly graphics[/b]. Close to pixelart, not close to seriousness at all. 
- [b]Low system requirements[/b]. 
- [b]Low price in relation to the content[/b]. 

[h1]Neutrals:[/h1]
- [b]Higher difficulty[/b]. But this is a standard for roguelike games.

[h1]Negatives:[/h1]
- [b]Repetitive battles[/b]. This guy goes there, shoots that guy. Another guy goes there, shoots any other guy...

author: {'steamid': '76561197995086922', 'num_games_owned': 1619, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 589, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1455655068}
review:
Pretty fun! Worth a look. 
I dug Super Trench Attack, more or less. This is a much different game.
Turn based, squad-based battles instead of real-time clicky action. The system is interesting. You have a certain amount of movement radius to use per squad member per turn (if you activate them), as well as a certain number of activation points you can use to make your squad members fire weapons.

You use WASD to make your active squad member move, and can only see a certain distance around them, though you can, at any time, check the map layout to see where the enemies are. Not certain why view distance is limited this way; probably to keep the sprites at an appropriate size, which is understandable. 

There are some light RPG elements to the squad building, but don't expect Jagged Alliance / XCOM / Wasteland 2 levels of customization. There are a few different classes, and you can select different weapon loadouts for particular characters. 

There are also some random events between encounters, but they more or less seem to be either ways to lose or gain HP, or ways to buy stuff slightly cheaper or trade food for money. 

That being said, I haven't played it that much yet... I will play it again, which is probably the biggest recommendation I can give.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058156743', 'num_games_owned': 1675, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 358, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1447008123}
review:
Okay, I finally got around to making a somewhat decent look on the game after the early access period and man this review was way overdue. Basically, not much has changed from when it was in early access with the exception of additional content being put into the game, with the new Company Officers being as unlockables after making a couple of runs by earning points towards unlocking them with different setups to start your journey with. However, I will be mostly be talking about the differences between Super Trench Attack 2 and another game that is clearly based off from is the gameplay aspect of Valkyria Chronicles.

What traits does each game share?

-The turn-based strategy of selecting a unit and controlling them freely around the map with a limited amount of stamina based on unit type
-The setting is based around a world war setting
-The general difficulty is your small squad vs the world

Traits that's more prevelant in Valkyria Chronicles:

-Heavily story-driven with visual novel-like cutscenes (very good story if not a bit cliché)
-Third-person mode makes it easier to spot enemies from a distance once your soldiers have line-of-sight
-Soldiers in your squad has personality in some description full with voice acting and unique character models
-Somewhat varying objectives throughout the campaign
-Multiple playthroughs are discouraging due to the imbalance in power between you and the enemy (mainly you can upgrade your squad and equipment to the point where you are straight up overpowered with orders breaking the difficulty even more)
-Again, the enemy is heavliy underpowered compared to you.You can go through the entire campaign without spending a single upgrade

Traits that's more prevelant in Super Trench Attack 2:

-Gameplay is clearly the focus of Super Trench Attack 2
-Very silly atmosphere compare to Valkyria Chronicles' serious atmosphere
-Rouge-like elements with randomized battlefields
-Difficulty is unforgiving so if you are not prepared for large scale fights, good luck
-Unit controls in a top-down view so it's more difficult to spot enemies across the level, but they do give you feedback on line-of-sight and when you've entered their firing range
-Little to no character personality
-Squad size is half the size of what you can deploy in Valkyria Chronicles
-no variable objecives with the only objective available is to eliminate the enemy team (Valkyria Chronicles mostly have you capture a specific control point, but they do mix it up from time to time)

Would I recommend Super Trench Attack 2? The answer is yes, especially if you love the gameplay of Valkyria Chronicles, but are also looking for a challange that Valkyria Chronicles fail to provide after your first playthrough.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995430590', 'num_games_owned': 728, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 433, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 433, 'last_played': 1650717969}
review:
Игра является продолжением 1 части. Жанр игры при этом стал иным. 
По порядку:
Сюжет: спустя 4 года после 1 войны, 1 сумасшедший объявил себя новым Кайзером и развязал очередную войну. Главный герой - женщина, которая возглавляет отряд сопротивления и в начале игры крадет секретные документы из замка Казйера...
Геймплей: если 1 часть была экшеном с видом сверху, то тут - пошаговая стратигия. Неожиданно. Перед нами карта с точками. Каждая точка - местность. Наша задача - пройти из начальной точки в конечную. На точках можно найти что-то интересное - магазин (можно находить золото и на него закупать бойцов, снарягу, покупать еду - она нужна, чтобы переходить на другую точку), сыграть в блекджек, встретить поехавших товарищей... ну и столкнуться с врагом. На деле игра не такая простая, как кажется. Перебили всех в отряде - начинай заново. Стычки с врагом проходят в пошаговом режиме - походил, пострелял 1 юнитом, потом другим... как только очки заканчиваются - ходит враг. 
Графика: графически игра не отличается от 1 части - таже рисовка, немного корявая, но это сделано специально для остроты юмора.
Звук и музыка: выдержаны в духе первой части.
В итоге мы имеем пошаговую стратегию в сеттинге неизвестной мировой войны (если 1 часть была про ПМВ - тут 4 года спустя), с отличным юмором, высмеивающим разнообразные военные и не только клише, интригующим сюжетом и не самым легким геймплеем. Любителям первой части и юмора аля Бенни Хилл - рекомендую!

Если обзора недостаточно - вот первые полчаса игры: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IUA46muWTgs

review:
Super Trench Attack 2 is a great game even at its recent launch into early access. It's different playstyle from the Original (Squad based-turn-based, rather then a top down Isometric Shooter) Gives a new playstyle which I've found to be quite enjoyable. The games small events are generally funny due to being out of proportion in a way, and the game still can prove a challenge if your not careful.

That being said, this game is a little repetitive due to it being in it's current state. Each Zone only has one map, and currently the only kind of mission is combat - Meaning it can begin to get repetitive, but im pretty sure new missions and probably maps will come out at some time sooner or later.

So yeah, from my experience, I'd give this game an 8/10 in it's current state.
Even if you don't really want this game, keep an eye on it - it has potential.
